c:
Fire Slam:The Firebat disconnects his gas lines launching him forward into the air then coming down hard grounding any enemy air units and stunning ground units.Damage to Air: /////Damage to Ground: /////Stun Duration Air: /////Stun Duration Ground: 1/1.5/2.0/2.5/3/3.5Range: /////Awareness Gain: /////Cool Down: /////Can only use out of combat
Eruption:The Firebat fires his flamethrower into the ground creating the rocks to melt and erupt underneath the target location causing damage and sending any enemy units into the air for seconds. Stops casting and channeling spells.Damage: /////Delay: 4.0/3.5/3.0/2.5/2.0/1.5Cost: /////Cool Down: /////Radius: 1.0/1.2/1.4/1.6/1.8/2.0
Battle Stance:When the Firebat sees any enemy unit within 8 yards he gets into his "Battle Stance" making sure there are no cracks in his armor. Giving the firebat 1% Damage reduction per enemy unit up to a max of 30%."1st Tier Ultimate"
Napalm Igniters:The Firebat switches to Napalm liquid in his gauntlets blasting an enemy unit melting his armour and dealing more damage over time. Initial damage is added upon each tick, and allies gain the extra damage as the targets armour weakens.Damage: ///Cost: ///Channeled Ability
Taunt:The Firebat Taunts a target enemy unit which forces it to attack the Firebat after a cast time of 1.8 seconds.Damage Reduction: 5/10/15/20Damage Taken: 5/10/15/20Duration of Damage Reduction: ///Duration of Damage Taken: ///Duration of Taunt: 2/4/6/8Cost: ///Cool Down: ///
Last Stand:When activated the Firebat gives one last stand increasing his Durability by 50 for 10 seconds."2nd Tier Ultimate"
Inner Fire:The Firebat Releases gas into an area then ignites it, causing enemy units to run around on fire for a short duration.Damage a Second: //Duration: //Cost: //
Combat Release:The Firebat clears his mind when below 20% HP allowing him to be free from combat even when in the midst of battle. This Allows for health regeneration, and the use of Fire slam during battle."3rd Tier Ultimate"
Stim Pack:Marine takes Life damage But allows him to attack and move faster for 15 seconds.Percent of Life: 20%/18%/16%/14%/12%/10%Movement Speed: 50%/60%/70%/80%/90%/100%Attack Speed: 50%/60%/70%/80%/90%/100%Cost: /////
Blow Back:The Marine's A42 rifle and Armor Piercing Shells have a chance to stun on impact.Chance on Hit: 4%/8%/12%/16%/20%/24%"Passive"
Impaling Dash:The Marine uses his Ammo Energy in his thrusters of his boots thrusting him forward with his Bayonet out Dealing damage to any enemy unit he hits, Impaling them on his bayonet taking them along for the ride.Damage: /////Cost: /////Cool Down: /////
Turn on Armor Piercing Shells:Changes weapon type to Armor Piercing Rounds. These Rounds do -20 base damage and extra damage to Armored units. Costs 1 Ammo Energy per attack ."1st Tier Ultimate"
Chrono Shell:The Marine shoots a Chrono Shell in the choosen direction slowing time in a line from the caster to the target point, and doing a small amount of damage every second.Damage: ///Time Scale: 40%/50%/60%/70%Cost: ///Cool Down: ///
Impaling Launch:The Marine Impales his target with his bayonet, lifts the target into the air then fires an explosive round from his rifle sending the target soaring through the air for a range of 9 in front of the caster.Impale Damage: ///Explosion Damage: ///Cost: ///Cool Down: ///
Concussive Shells:Changes weapon type to Concussive Shells. These Rounds will slow and damage units in an area. These rounds do -52 damage, and does 50% AOE damage to other enemy units, also slowing them by 50% for 1.5 sec upon impact within 1 radius. Concussive Shells deals 14 extra to Massive, Mechanical, Robotic, and Structure units it Costs 4 Ammo Energy per attack."2nd Tier Ultimate"
All In One:The Marine combines all 3 weapon types into a single shot dealing a large amount of damage, pierces armor, slows the unit, and sets the unit on fire, dealing damage over time.Damage: //Damage Per Second: //Slow: 40%/60%/80%Duration: //Cost: //Cool Down: //
Flame Thrower:Changes weapon type to Flame Thrower. The Flame Thrower does -48 instant damage but stacks up to 4 times on a target, dealing 10 base damage over 6 seconds. Gives the Marine a shield. Giving him 40% more HP and 30% more SP. Costs 2 Ammo Energy per attack.D.O.T benefits from more weapon damage."3rd Tier Ultimate"
Sealing Bolt:A powerful anti-merc blast that deals damage (Extra damage to Mercs). Locks down the Hero for a few Seconds.Damage: /////Added Hero Damage: /////Stun Duration: 1.5/2/2.5/3/3.5/4
Bloodlust:Applies a buff that increases the damage of the target but also does damage over time and silences the targeted unit.Damage Over Time: /////Bonus Damage: /////Duration of Buff: /////
Combat Blink:The Stalker blinks towards an enemy target or point dealing damage to any enemies within 1 radius on impact.Range: /////Damage: /////
Track:The Stalker puts a mark on the target unit enabling him the ability to see the target regardless of cloak or fog of war, and gives The Stalker increased movement speed by 20%."1st Tier Ultimate"
Blink Dodge:Gives The Stalker a chance to Blink out of the way of an incoming attack.Chance: 10%/20%/30%/40%"Passive"
Illusion Dance:Blinks the stalker to a random point and creates several hallucinations around him.Illusions: ///Life Span: ///
Prey on the Weak:The Stalker gains 30% attack speed and 20% damage when near an enemy Hero below 30% HP"2nd Tier Ultimate"
Teleport:The Stalker Teleports anywhere in the map after it's finished casting.Cast Time: //
Kill Shot:The Stalker gains 40% of the target units hit points, only if he is the one that gets the "Kill Shot" (Damage from items will not work)."3rd Tier Ultimate"
Snipe:Snipe a target dealing a large amount of damage to it.Damage: /////Stress Increase Cost: /////For each Increment of 50 Stress the damage of Snipe is reduced by 20%
Domination:The Ghost taps into the targets mind to make it fight for her for 15 seconds, removing a percentage of your total Stress over that time as long as the dominated unit is still alive. If the target is a Mercenary then the target is stunned for 3 seconds, and you receive half the stress reduction instantly.Reduction of Stress: 15%/30%/45%/60%/75%/90%Reduction of Stress if Merc: 7.5%/15%/22.5%/30%/37.5%/45%
Camouflage:Camouflage allows the Ghost to blend in with its surroundings making it nearly invisible to the naked eye also increases the Ghosts Stress reduction per second, if the Ghost moves from her spot while Camouflaged she will lose her Camouflage.Stress Reduction per Second: -2/-4/-6/-8/-10/-12Cool Down: 10/8/6/4/2/1
Decoy:The Ghost creates a copy of herself at a target location and can switch places with it at any point while it is alive.Set of Abilities:Decoy Snipe: Deals 10-150 Damage.Reset Decoy: Resets the decoy allowing the ghost to place it somewhere else.Swap Decoy: Switches the Ghosts position with the Decoy, killing the decoy (no range limit)."Tier 1 Ultimate"
EMP Burst Round:Creates an electromagnetic pulse that does damage to shields and drains energy of all units in the targeted area. Cloaked units hit by EMP Burst Round are revealed for a 10 second duration.Shield Damage: ///Energy Drain: 30%/40%/50%/60%Blast Radius: 1.5/2.0/2.5/3.0Stress Increase Cost: ///Cool Down: ///For each increment of 50 Stress Shield Damage inflicted is reduced by 20%, and your EMP Burst Round will have a chance to miss, and hit in a random location around the target point. The miss offset is increased for each increment
Lock Down:The Ghost Launches a missile at an enemy target, on impact it completly locks down the target. Once locked down the target cannot move, attack, or use abilities/items. Lock Down makes the target invulnerable. Lock Down can only be prematurely removed by the Ghost.Lock Down Duration: ///Stress Increase Cost: ///Cool Down: ///- For each increment of 50 Stress, Lock Down has a 5% chance to backfire
Suicide Drone:When the Ghost acquires a target the Suicide Drone will go in for the attack as well. Every hit from the Suicide Drone melts the armour of the target dealing 1% extra damage to it (this stacks up to 10 times). Once the Suicide Drone is out of Ammo/Energy it Kamikazes into the target dealing 140-200 AOE damage."2nd Tier Ultimate"
Stress Management:The Ghost is able to unleash her Stress through damaging an opponent with her rifle. every basic attack she does lowers her Stress.Stress Reduction:-2 when above 0/-4 when above 50/-6 when above 100/-8 when above 150-4 when above 0/-6 when above 50/-8 when above 100/-10 when above 150-6 when above 0/-8 when above 50/-10 when above 100/-12 when above 150"Passive"
Stressd Out:The Ghost becomes unstable. Giving into her Stress, she cannot move or attack until she reaches 200 Stress which sends a shockwave through the map stunning everything in its path for 5 seconds.Channeled Ability"3rd Tier Ultimate"
Chain Lightning:The Archon Shoots a bolt of electricity to a selected target dealing damage which bounces from enemy to enemy. Deals 20 less damage for each jump.Damage: / / / / Bounces: 3 / 5 / 7 / 9 / 11 / 13Cool down: / / / / / Cost: / / / / /
Power Overwhelming:The Archon Harnesses the power within him, to enrage himself giving him Rage and Resistance to Stun and Snare Effects.Rage gain: / / / / / Duration of Resistance: / / / / /
Void Charge:The Archon gathers Void Energy then shoots it at a target point. Every time that an enemy unit attacks within 10 yards around the Void Charge the Void Charge will shoot Void Missiles, damaging them. The Void Charge is invulnerable.Damage: / / / / / Duration: / / / / / Cool down: / / / / / Cost: / / / / /
Static Charge:Every time the Archon deals damage to an enemy it gains a Static Charge. 50% of the time the Archon takes damage he gains a Static Charge. Once the Archon has 10 Static Charges it can release one big Static Discharge dealing 150 damage to a random enemy within a yard range."1st Tier Ultimate"
Lightning Grapple:The Archon produces a ball of energy that he can fire, this energy ball is linked to him through an electrical beam. The ball cannot be killed, and only last a certain duration of time before the Archon must obsorb it again. When the duration has ended or if Lightning Grapple Retract is used then the Archon is pulled back to the Lightning Grapple. Upon Impact it causes anything within a 2 yard radius to be stunned.Range: / / / Duration of Grapple: / / / Duration of Stun: / / / Cost: / / /
Void Ripple:The Archon channels his Rage to create a rift in the void allowing energy to escape and create a large Void Ripple. The Ripple expands outwards doing constant damage around him until retracts back to the Archon doing massive damage to anything close by.Channel Time: 3 / 2.5 / 2.0 / 1.5Small Explosion Damage: / / / Large Explosion Damage: / / / Cost: / / /
Negative Charge:The Archon shifts his magnetic field creating a powerful negative charge forcing enemies around him to be lifted into the air and knocked back . Deals Damage on impact with the ground.Does not effect massive units"2nd Tier Ultimate"
Orbit:The Archon Lifts a certain amount of targets up into the air, holding them in place as he charges up a devestating attack. Upon impact of the attack the units are released.Damage: / / Max Targets: / / Channel Duration Stun: / / Cool down: / / Cost: / /
Positive Charge:The Archon focuses his rage to change the gravitational pull around him causing enemy units to be pulled towards him. Deals 70 damage a second within a 2 yard radius. Damage is reduced by 25% for every 2 yards to a maximum 6 yards."3rd Tier Ultimate"
Psi Blade Strike: A quick strike that deals damage to both Ground and Air units.Damage: -40/-60/-80/-100/-120/-140Cost: /////
Blink:Teleports The Shadow Knight to a nearby location.Cost: /////Cool Down: /////
Void Prison:Imprisons the enemy in psionic energy, stunning it and suppressing all abilities, until unit takes damage.Duration: /////Cool Down: /////
Shadow Pounce:The Shadow Knight jumps onto any air unit riding it where ever it goes he can then jump from that one to another at will."1st Tier Ultimate"
Blade Storm:The Shadow Knight jumps into the air spinning his blade damaging anything around him. (damage is less the further the enemy is away) Stops casting and channeling spells.Damage: ///Radius: /.5//3.5Cool Down: ///
Psi Shurikens:The Shadow Knight peppers the target with Psi Shurikens.Damage per Shuriken: Shurikens Tossed: ///Cost: ///Cool Down: ///
Kick Off:The Shadow Knight kicks off a random target around him making the Shadow Knight jump away from the target and stuns it for 3 seconds."2nd Tier Ultimate"
Smoke Bomb:The Shadow Knight throws down a smoke bomb making all enemy units within it blind. The Smoke Bomb also slows movement speed. Allied or enemy units cannot see inside the smoke bomb.Radius: 7/8/9Slow: 30%/40%/50%Sight Radius: 1/0.5/0Cool Down: //
Slice and Dice:The Shadow Knight runs towards a targeted unit at blinding speeds, upon impact he deals 40 damage (multiplied by each successful pass) to the target. As the Shadow Knight Slides to a stop he is able to use Slice and Dice again within a 2 second time frame. Each pass weakens the enemy making him take 40 additional damage, this stacks, and refreshes per stack.Ability does not scale cliffs."3rd Tier Ultimate"
Freeze:Prevents the target from moving for a short time and finishes by damaging it.Root Duration: /////Damage: /////Cost: /////
Shield Boost:Regenerates a friendly unit's shields. 1 Energy consumed per shield pint gained.Shield Gain: /////"Channeled"
Ocular:Sharpens the eye sight of a targeted ally, allowing him to land better placed hits on enemies, increasing all forms of their damage. Also turns the target into a detector, allowing it to see cloaked and burrowed units.Damage Increase: 4%/8%/12%/16%/20%/24%Duration: /////
Wormhole:Teleports the hero and up to 20 nearby friendly units to any target location on the map."1st Tier Ultimate"
Protect:Creates a shield around a target friendly unit that absorbs 50% of damage dealt to it and is destroyed after absorbing a certain amount.Damage Absorb: ///
Forceful Hand:The Preserver releases a massive force at a target point pushing all units away from it.Distance Pushed: 3/6/9/12Radius: ///Range: ///
Recall From The Void:The preserver resurrects all allied mercenaries back from the dead within a range of 40 with 10% HP and 5% SP. Upon being revived after a 2 second cast period any enemy units with a 2.5 unit radius that deals 100 - 150 damage which dissipates every 0.5 unit range after a 1 unit radius by 25%."2nd Tier Ultimate"
Spirit Form:The preserver lets go of his terrestrial body and takes spirit form, allowing him to become invulnerable for a short duration. This also gives him the ability to fly, but loses his basic attack. Higher levels of this ability, allow you to use more of your other abilities.Abilities allowed: All Basic Abilities/Tier 1 Ult/Tier 2 UltDuration: 5/10/15Can shift back to terrestrial form at any time by clicking the Terrestrial Form ability.
Merge:The Preserver selects an allied mercenary target and merges with it, while merged, the target unit gains 30 HP and 30 SP a second. He can merge with Zerg, Terran, or Protoss turning into a new being with different sets of abilities. Once merged both players control the single unit.Preserver and Terran:Unit: ViolatorPreserver and Protoss:Unit: NemesisPreserver and Zerg:Unit: Behemoth
Over-dose:The Medic Increases the dosage of Medicine, targeting an enemy and doing damage over time until the channel stage is finished. Then Overdose does a large amount of damage and stuns for a period of time.Damage Over Time: 11.5/13.5/16/20/26.5/40Damage: /////Channel Time: /////Cost: /////Cool Down: /////
Heal Beam:Heals a friendly Biological Unit costs 1 energy for all levels.Heal Amount: /////
Flash Heal:The Medic charges up her med-pack for 1 seconds then releases an instant heal on the targeted allied unit.Heal Amount: /////Cost: /////Cool Down: /////
Molecular-Repair Nanites:The Medic releases tiny nanites into the air surrounding her which will heal allied units for 10 hp a sec. If the medic uses heal beam on an ally, the nanites move to the target of the Heal ability."1st Tier Ultimate"
Stim Injection:The Medic Attempts to inject a stim pack into a unit, she tends to miss the vain a lot at low levels dealing more damage. At higher levels it deals a lot less damage.Damage: ///Attk/Mov Increase: 10%
Flare:Shots a Flare at a target point blinding and slowing all enemies within range.
s: Slow: 10%/20%/30%/40%Blind Duration: ///Sight Radius: ///If the enemy can detect cloak, then their detection will be disabled until the duration of blind expires.
c: Med-bots:The Medic throws A Capsule packed with Med-bots at the position a hero has died, and revives the targetted fallen ally Hero with 10% Life and 5% Shields After 6 seconds, giving them A "Fresh Start" buff of +2 Movement Speed and 2x Attack Speed for 3 seconds. If the Med-bots are destroyed before the hero Revives it will cancel the Revive.
Heal-bots:The Medic tosses heal-bots onto allied mercenaries healing them over time.

Pain Relief:The medic before every battle secretly stores a pack onto every ally. When she remotely triggers this pack one of 2 things will happen. If the allied Mercenary is below 10% HP then the pack will Blow up killing the allied unit ending his suffering and dealing 600 damage to all enemy units within a 4 yard radius. On the other hand if the allied unit is above 10% then they will be healed for a max of 1000 HP
